diff_act: 4.provide a login password prompt for configuring device rules
5.allow an additional login password to be entered

regen.absent_element: validation of user accounts before making changes remotely
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate user account credentials before allowing remote changes to be made.

label: The option to configure device rules shall require an additional login password for that option.
